description: Caretaker managers are often thrust into the limelight for a short term fix, before quickly returning to their backroom staff role. How many of them can you remember from the Premier League era?
title: Quiz: Who are these 20 Premier League caretaker managers?
title_page: Quiz: Who are these 20 Premier League caretaker managers? | Daily Mail Online
text:
Caretaker managers are anything but the most high-profile figures in the Premier League.
They're often those loyal figures who spend most of their career at the same club and find themselves thrust into the limelight after a managerial departure to offer some stability and continuity.
But they typically return to their backroom role as soon as a replacement manager is found, sometimes in a matter of days.
How many of these Premier League caretaker managers can you name in our quiz below?
But how many of them can you remember? The Premier League has had hundreds of different managers, and a surprisingly high number of caretaker managers too, many of whom have long since left the memory banks.
This week's challenge is to see if you can name all 20 caretaker bosses we've collated pictures of. There are four possible answers for each question.
